Please post damage for your chars, Jason.


::FZ/Prowl/Grimmler/Kluster/Firearm/Proto::

FZ frowns, looking at Angel Prime. "For your information, Maximal, we 
were in the proccess of returning the Maximal and leaving the CF when 
you attacked. You can remain here, we have no use of you."

He motions for the Alliance to stop firing. "Dark One," he says over 
his comm, "As soon as Unitron and the rest leave the Cybertronian 
Fire, return the Maximal and we'll get out of here."

He looks back at Angel Prime, his eyes glancing over at the other 
Maximals, who were advancing with their guns ready, uncertain whether 
to fire or not now that the Alliance had stopped firing.

"The Alliance will depart as soon as all our bots are out of your 
base. Untill then, neither side will fire on the other."

FZ looks back at Angel Prime, a small smile playing over his 
lips. "Now tell me, Maximal, what did you gain by defying your 
commander and opening fire? If you hadn't, we'd be long gone from 
here, and you'd had your Maximal back and would be able to repair the 
others. You simply delayed our departure, as well as endangered the 
Maximals. Next time, I suggest you listen to your commander."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl looks over at Hot Rod. "I have no idea. The Alliance is no 
longer firing."

He looks at Iron Raptor. "Do we still fight? And I think we should go 
up there to keep an eye on Zardus' clone at least."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Kluster, Firearm, Grimmler, and Proto stop a little ways from the 
Alliance, looking at them suspicioustly and ready for battle.
